description:
A mobile suit of the mysterious group "Barnum" that attacked the "Mastima" special forces commanded by Mehmet. This suit is piloted by Quentin`s younger brother Walter Fermo. Though the suit is known to be a variant of Byarlant, the details in which how it was obtained or developed remain unknown.
Source: gundam.info
name: RX-160G Byarlant Isolde
